| History                 = The '''Locust Brotherhood''' is an ancient group of Aztec trackers who were rumored to have been able to control insects and had passed down the symbolic [[Locust Armor]] to firstborn sons named Fernando, in honor of the first king of [[Spain]], to protect nomads, vagabonds, and runaways in [[Mexico]].

Centuries later and now operating out of the [[Immaculate Conception Church]] in [[San Diego]], [[California (State)|California]], [[United States of America]], when [[Fernanda Rodriguez (Earth-616)|Fernanda Rodriguez]]'s mother died before bearing a son, the Brotherhood was convinced to give the girl a chance to prove herself as the next generation's Locust.{{r|Champions Vol 2 9}}
